name: rspcedv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: rspcimedv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: rspcimedv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wb(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wb(w2, w1))

comment: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by FL, 17-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
